card.name: Skeletonfy
card.text: Skeletonfy deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token.

card.name: Broken Shortsword
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and can’t block. Equip {1}

card.name: Faber's Hatching
card.text: Create a 1/1 blue Merfolk Horror creature token. If this was cast from your graveyard, draw a card. Flashback 2U (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Return for Duty
card.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 2/2 white Zombie creature token with lifelink and decayed. (It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Exile Return for Duty.

card.name: Deathless Ceremony
card.text: Target player exiles a nontoken creature they control. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Frenzied Predation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has trample and haste. Enchanted creature can’t block.

card.name: Through the Skull
card.text: Choose one — • Target player discards two cards. • Through the Skull deals 3 damage to target player and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Craftiness of the Meek
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, you may tap target creature. 1U, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Misleading Mist
card.text: Put target creature into its owner’s library second from the top, then that player may mill three cards.

card.name: Fling Through Hell
card.text: Exile all creatures and graveyards.

card.name: Radiant Chains
card.text: Radiant Chains deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Demonic Vortex
card.text: Players can’t gain life. 1B: Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. Activate this ability only once per turn.

card.name: Hellfire Ant
card.text: Menace Whenever another creature enters under your control, up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Immortal Oath
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you gain 1 life. Whenever you gain life, target player mills that many cards.

card.name: Viscera Blast
card.text: You lose X life. Viscera Blast deals X damage to target player and up to one target creature that player controls.

card.name: Tranquil Repose
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block. When enchanted creature is sacrificed, you draw a card.

card.name: Return the Forsaken
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. You gain X life.

card.name: Begin Again
card.text: Spectacle 1G (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Begin Again.

card.name: Sign in Blood
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Crackshot Skeleton
card.text: Reach At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Skeleton you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Hallowed Mist
card.text: Choose X — • Each player sacrifices an artifact. • Each player sacrifices an enchantment. • Each player sacrifices a creature with power 4 or greater. • Each player sacrifices a planeswalker.

card.name: Gloom Fracture
card.text: Gloom Fracture costs {2} less to cast if you or a permanent you control is being targeted. Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: March From Beyond
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, return up to one target Zombie or Skeleton card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever a creature you control dies, return it the battlefield tapped under your control with a finality counter on it.

card.name: Shamble En Masse
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Zombie creature token with lifelink and decayed. (A creature with decayed can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Sacrifice two creatures: Draw a card and you lose 1 life. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Orbisfaber's Corruption
card.text: Up to two target creatures have base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

card.name: Whispering Walls
card.text: Defender {T}: Add {B}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell or to activate an ability in a graveyard. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Impending Return
card.text: Mill five cards. When you do, Return up to two permanent cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Silfidiae's Influence
card.text: Choose one or both — • Put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. • Untap a land you control. It becomes a 4/4 green Skeleton Giant with haste until end of turn. It’s still a land.

card.name: Mad Summoner
card.text: Pact (At the beginning of your end step, put a pact counter on a creature you control if you haven’t this turn, then sacrifice it if it has two or more.) Whenever you put a pact counter on a creature you control, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Abyssal Captain
card.text: Pact (At the beginning of your end step, put a pact counter on a creature you control if you haven’t this turn, then sacrifice it if it has two or more.) Flying Creatures you control with pact counters on them have +1/+1.

card.name: Burst Forth
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Discard a card. If it was a land card, draw two cards.

card.name: Reduce to Embers
card.text: Reduce to Embers deals 3 damage to any target. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Fiendish Scheming
card.text: Each player draws four cards. Until the end of your next turn, you have no maximum hand size.

card.name: Bloodied Lieutenant
card.text: First strike Whenever you discard a card or a creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Davriel, the Pactmaker
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card unless an opponent discards a card. You lose 1 life. [-2]: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. [-5]: Return target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Nightmare Webbing
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target creature with flying. • Create a 2/1 green Spider creature token with reach.

card.name: Invigorating Essence
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Spitting Hellfire
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile up to four cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way. Spitting Hellfire deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Aggressive Foraging
card.text: Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.) Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Maddening Descent
card.text: Maddening Descent deals X plus two damage to target creature. Then mill that many cards.

card.name: Provoking the Masses
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”

card.name: Malicious Mimicry
card.text: Each player sacrifices a creature. If you sacrificed a creature this way, create a token that’s a copy of it.

card.name: Unshackled Desire
card.text: Target creature’s controller may sacrifice it. If they don’t, gain control of it until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.text: Search your library for a Vampire or Bat card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. You gain 3 life.
